effects: This drug can cause Diarrhea, Constipation, Abdominal pain, Increased saliva, Nausea, Dizziness, Headache, and Tremors.

title: Levopraid 50MG Tab 2x10 (L)
details: It is used to treat Depression, Indigestion, Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease, Mental disorders, Irritable bowel syndrome, Anxiety disorder, Vertigo, Hallucinations, Schizophrenia, and Persistent heartburns.
precautions: It is not recommended for women who are Pregnant or Planning to get pregnant or Breastfeeding women. Patient with Heart disease, Hypokalemia and Diabetes must exercise caution before administering the medicine.
effects: Breast tenderness, Weight gain, Decreased libido, Irregular menstrual cycle, Unusual tiredness and weakness, Drowsiness, Dizziness, Breast enlargement in males or Gynecomastia, Neuroleptic malignant syndrome may occur.

title: Masacol 400MG Tab 3x10 (L)
details: It used to treat inflammatory bowel disease, including ulcerative colitis, or inflamed anus or rectum, and to maintain remission in Crohn's disease.
precautions: It is contraindicated in patients with known hypersensitivity to the drug. Caution is advised while using this medicine in patients with active peptic ulcer disease due to the increased risk of worsening of the patient's condition. This medicine is not recommended for use in breastfeeding women unless absolutely necessary. Please consult your doctor when taking this medicine if you are pregnant.
effects: Abdominal and stomach pain, Blurred vision, Bloating, Headache, Irregular heartbeat.

title: Spasfon 40MG Inj 1x6 (L)
details:
The Spasfon injection is an anti-spasmodic medication. The injection comes with the generic name of its ingredients described in the next section. It comes in the packaging of 6 injections in one pack.

Ingredients:

The components of

READ MORE
precautions: The essential precautionary measures to go through before the administration of Spasfon injection are illustrated below. Follow the precautions listed below to avoid any harmful side effects.The Spasfon injection must not be used if you experience any hypersensitivity to it or its ingredients.The medication should not be administered to children under six years of age.The Spasfon injection must be used with extreme caution in patients with Down's syndrome.The injection must be used with caution in children and elderly people.The medication needs to be administered with caution in GERD-affected patients.Inform your doctor if you are suffering from diarrhea prior to using the injection.Notify your doctor before using the Spasfon injection if you are suffering from ulcerative colitis.Patients with autonomic neuropathy must use the injection with extreme caution.Patients with hypertension and high blood pressure need to monitor their blood pressure.Inform your doctor if you are suffering from any cardiac disorder characterized by increased heart rate.Patients with hyperthyroidism (increased thyroid hormone production) must inform their doctor first.Inform your doctor if you experience a high fever.Notify your doctor if you are a glaucoma patient before using the Spasfon injection.Inform your doctor if you are suffering from any liver or kidney disorder.The medication might cause drowsiness and low blood pressure. Avoid using the machinery or driving if it causes dizziness.The Spasfon injection is contraindicated in case of pregnancy. It should not be used without a doctor's prescription.The injection is not recommended to use for breastfeeding mothers. Do not use the Spasfon injection without the doctor's advice.Keep the medication in a safe place.Keep the injection away from the reach of children.Please consult your doctor when taking this medicine if you are pregnant. One should not drive a vehicle if using the medicine makes you drowsy, dizzy or lowers your blood pressure extensively. Tell your doctor/pharmacist if you are allergic to it, or if you have any other allergies.
effects: The possible Spasfon injection side effects are described below. It is recommended to consult a doctor in case you experience any worsening or extreme side effects.ConstipationTransient bradycardia which is followed by tachycardia, palpitation, or arrhythmiasReduced bronchial secretionsUrinary urgency or retentionDilatation of the pupils and loss of accommodationPhotophobiaDry mouthFlushingDryness of the skinDizzinessHeadacheDiarrheaLow blood pressureAllergic reaction causing swelling or rashesSide-effects that can occur occasionally include confusion (mostly in the elderly)nauseavomitinggiddiness.The side effects which can occur very rarely are:angle-closure glaucomaDrowsiness, Dizziness, Hypotension or Headache may occur.

title: Ganaton 50MG Tab 3x10 (L)
details:
Ganaton Tablet is a film-coated tablet that contains lactose, cornstarch, carnauba, magnesium stearate, and many other ingredients as inactive ingredients. Ganaton tablet formula is helpful in the treatment of gastrointestinal symptoms.

Av
READ MORE
precautions: Some of the Ganaton tablet precautions are described below one by one.Inform the doctor about your past and current medical condition before using this medication. Also, inform the doctor if you are taking any medications and supplements at the same time.This medicine should not be recommended to breastfeeding mothers.Ganaton tablet in pregnancy is not safe. Consult the doctor, so that he/she can suggest you an alternative treatment to avoid the adverse side effects.If you experience the side effect of drowsiness, then avoid driving.Inform the doctor if you notice the symptoms of an allergic reaction or rashes.
effects: Every person may not experience the side effect of the Ganatonmedication. Some people may experience its side effects, but some of the side effects disappear as the user body adjust itself to the medicine. But if any of the Ganaton side effects get worsen, then immediately consult the doctor, and take a suggestion from him. Ganaton tablet side effects are listed below.It can cause some common side effects such as diarrhoea, nausea, headache, and dizziness.It may cause constipation, chest pain, and abdominal pain.Some studies have shown the side effects of increased saliva and tremors.It can also cause allergic reactions and rashes on the body.It can cause giddiness, and you may feel a problem in sleeping that is known as a sleeping disorder.Ganaton Tablet has another rare side effect which is the secretion of milk.Maybe all of the Ganaton side effects are not described here. Therefore, for further information, take advice from the doctor.

title: Spasfon 80MG Tab 3x10 (L)
details:

precautions: Check all the ingredients before using this, if the patient is hypersensitive to any of the ingredients, avoid using this tablet.Make sure to check the leaflet that comes along with the Spasfon Tablet for the direction of use.Check if you are allergic to any ingredients contained in this medicine. If so, avoid using this medicine.Do not exceed the recommended dose or overdose may lead to severe side effects.It should not be given to pregnant women or women who are nursing their infants. It should not be given to children under the age of 16.
